languageKey.label: Address
Template File: HTML-template which is used to display adresses (e.g.: "fileadmin/templates/defaut_hcard.html").
Default Template File Name: The file name of your default template.

Starting Point (pid_list): The PID of the page (or comma separated list pf PIDs) where your adresses are stored. Note that getting the pidList can be very performance intensive if you use a high recursion level (plugin.tt_address.recursive) in a big pagetree.
Recursive level: extend "pidList" by the number of recursive levels.
Sort by Column: By wich column of the database should the adresses sorted (e.g: name, first_name, last_name, city, zip, country)
Sort Order: Set how shall the adresses sorted in the frontend by default. (ASC, DSC)
List Max Items: Set how many adresses should be shown in the frontend by default
